data.name: Volcano Princess
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the Country of Volcano.
——In this volcanic country, what kind of life will you create for your daughter?

Spend precious time with your daughter as she grows up!

You were a soldier of great virtue, who found this little girl the night the war ended.
Raise your daughter from infancy, through schooling and into adulthood as you accompany her on the path to adulthood.

Residents of the volcanic country are enjoying themselves!

After the war between humans and demons ended, long-awaited peace has finally arrived. Enjoy passing time surrounded by soft sunshine and the sound of gentle music.
There are all kinds of NPCs living here, men and women, young and old, of many different races. Everyone lives peacefully with their own beliefs.

When you take your daughter out, as well as boating, eating, and amusement, you can also meet all kinds of town residents.
These residents aren't simply passengers in your daughter's life journey, they also have their own lives!
NPC residents have their own stories, and the choices of you and your daughter will affect their lives.

A wholesome and tender bonding experience!

Start with babbling and crawling, slowly learn manners, etiquette, knowledge...carefully arrange everything for her.
Let her learn music and painting, or make her proficient in martial arts and fighting. What kind of future will intertwine with dozens of different skill combinations?

If you neglect her, your daughter may go astray.

Volcano Festival celebration! Competition! Adventure!

In the grand Volcano Festival celebration, let your daughter show off her skills in the competition!
The secrets of the ancestors lay buried in the dark canyon, waiting for the brave to discover…

A variety of endings!

What kind of person will the daughter become?
Will she be outstanding, ordinary, or evil?
Every decision will affect your daughter's future.
She can become anything and persue all kinds of dreams, everything is up to you.

data.short_description: After the war between humans and demons, you found a baby on the battlefield and became a father. You will Plan time and courses for her, bring her into contact with various roles, and raise her up. The daughter's future and the ending of the volcano country depends on each of your choices.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
